data.message:
I don't wanna be like this
I don't really wanna hurt no feelings
But I'm only being real when I say
Nobody wants to see their grandfather rap (nope)
And old men have heart attacks
And I don't wanna be responsible for that so
Put the Mic down and walk away
If you still have a little bit of dignity

replies.message: Which he doesnt. Watch, this album will probably have pop songs with "singers" like sia, sklyer grey, Rihanna, pink, etc....or even that mate reuss homo. I really hope I'm proved wrong.
